page.title: 19TRADE.RETAIL TO PUBLIC.
page.content:
Our area is rural with only two village shops in Linton and Gorsley. Upton Bishop's shop closed around 1980.Both are general stores including Post Office.A nursery retailing plants,flowers,and fresh vegetables opened recently in Gorsley and is gaining popularity. Harry Cole's light haulage is in Linton. A bakery is at Kempley just outside our area.However twice weekly delivery service is undertaken in the area and beyond.A Kitchen and Interior designer works from his home on Linton Ridge. Three public houses serve the area.The "Alma"in Linton named after the battle in the Crimean war.The "Lord Welling- ton"in Upton Bishop and the "Road- maker"in Gorsley.
{ }
